example.//: The SIEM will attempt to parse all incoming logs into a LogEntry object, according to parameters defined in the following fields.
example.pattern: if method is regex, the pattern to separate components, else use comma-separated values (e.g: timestamp, pkt_num, proto, pkt_len, dir, src_ap, dst_ap, rule, action)
example.///: if method is json, use kvp to map LogEntry fields to log fields
example.dateFormat:
Can be one of [TextDate, ISO8601, RFC2822] OR a specific format (e.g. MM/dd-HH:mm:ss.zzz).
                        See Qt documentation on QDateTime::fromString() for more info
